amendment.description: To make minor changes to the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3287 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3287 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S7276; text: CR S7276) To make minor changes to the preamble.
